sn35.142:3.1: 142. Ajjhattānattahetusutta
sn35.142:4.2: Yopi hetu, yopi paccayo cakkhussa uppādāya, sopi anattā.
sn35.142:4.3: Anattasambhūtaṃ, bhikkhave, cakkhu kuto attā bhavissati … pe …
sn35.142:4.5: Yopi hetu yopi paccayo jivhāya uppādāya, sopi anattā.
sn35.142:4.6: Anattasambhūtā, bhikkhave, jivhā kuto attā bhavissati … pe …
sn35.142:4.8: Yopi hetu yopi paccayo manassa uppādāya, sopi anattā.
sn35.142:4.9: Anattasambhūto, bhikkhave, mano kuto attā bhavissati.
